titleStmt.title: Nihil absque deo. Try the preserving of health. These are to advertise all persons, whose illness may require the help of a physitian, that there is come to this place an experience artist, who (by the blessing of God) performs the gift of healing and cures most distempers incident to the bodies of men, women, and children ...

notesStmt.note: Title taken from caption and first lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
